entities.name: mostafa
entities.description: Mostafa is a referee who got kicked in the shins by a mediwizard. He looked exceptionally embarrassed and started shouting at the veela.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was watching the scene through Omnioculars.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman commented on Mostafa's behavior and predicted that the situation could turn nasty.

entities.name: bulgarian beaters
entities.description: The Bulgarian Beaters, Volkov and Vulchanov, landed on either side of Mostafa and began arguing with him.

entities.name: volkov
entities.description: Volkov was one of the Bulgarian Beaters who argued with Mostafa.

entities.name: vulchanov
entities.description: Vulchanov was another member of the Bulgarian Beaters who got into an argument with Mostafa.

entities.name: mediwizard
entities.description: A mediwizard came onto the field and kicked Mostafa in the shins.

entities.name: veela
entities.description: The veela stopped dancing and looked mutinous when Mostafa started shouting at them.

entities.name: bulgarian team mascots
entities.description: Mostafa was attempting to send off the Bulgarian team mascots.

relationships.description: A mediwizard kicked Mostafa in the shins.
Mostafa started shouting at the veela.
Bagman commented on Mostafa's attempt to send off the Bulgarian team mascots.
Vulchanov got into an argument with Mostafa.
The Bulgarian Beaters, Volkov and Vulchanov, argued with Mostafa.
